page.title: 15 HOUSES IN INKPEN
page.content: Many of the children in the school have moved into Inkpen from other parts of the country because of the job opportunities in this area. Because of the attractive scenery and the ease of access to Reading and London, house prices are expensive in Inkpen. A survey of the different types of houses in Inkpen was made. Key:- D = Detached; SD = Semi-detached; T = Terraced; B = Bungalow; F = Farm and P = Pub. Heads Lane:- l5 houses - 9D; 2SD and 4B. Bell Lane:- 7 houses - 3D; 2SD; lB and lT. Folly Road:- l6 houses - 9D; 2SD and 5B. Common Road:- 27 houses - 5D; l2SD; 6T; lB; 2F and lP. Robins Hill:- 2O houses and 20 SD.
